ValidationRule.description: You cannot change the name of prospect shops if you are not Lead Management.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Name), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Prospect_Shop', $User.ignore_validation_rules__c = false, $Profile.Name != 'Lead Manager', $Profile.Name != 'Contract Manager (new)', $UserRole.Name != 'System Administrators')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the name of a prospect shop. Please contact Lead Management to request the change.
